title: EDA & Big Data Strategy with R
description: Conducted EDA on car price data using R and tidyverse for cleaning, visualization, and statistical analysis. Proposed scalable big data solutions integrating R with Apache Spark and cloud storage for efficient analysis. Compared OLAP vs OLTP and cloud vs on-premise for optimal big data handling.

title: GIS Mapping: National Parks & COVID-19
description: Created a general-purpose map of Wales highlighting national parks and a statistical map showing COVID-19 case rates per 100k across Indian states using QGIS. Visualized population-normalized data to support public health and educational analysis.

title: Crime & Deprivation Mapping
description: Analyzed the correlation between crime rates and socioeconomic deprivation in Cardiff and Swansea using QGIS. Applied spatial techniques like overlay and buffer analysis to identify high-crime, low-income areas and support targeted policy intervention.

title: Face Recognition Attendance System
description: Developed a face recognition attendance system using Python, OpenCV, DeepFace, and SQLite. Features real-time authentication, GUI via Tkinter, and admin control. Achieved 95% accuracy with secure and efficient attendance logging.

title: Dynamic Pricing Engine with CLV Prediction
description: Developed a machine learning-based dynamic pricing engine integrating CLV predictions to personalize prices for online retail. Used Python, XGBoost, and real-world e-commerce data to optimize revenue, retention, and customer satisfaction.
